availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewalen Shadones (Caldwell/ Lyon County, cooper and farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County and Lyon County, Kentucky, cooper and farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky native. Son of Nancy Shadones. Married to Mary Winter Shadones in Lyon County, Kentucky, on January 5, 1863. Father of July Shadones and Thomas Shadones. Student in Caldwell County in 1850. Cooper in Lyon County in 1860. Farmer in Lyon County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 319B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 671.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 23A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lyon County Marriages, Film #000321364.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lyon County, KY, June 1863, p. 23.
